component.name: OTPClient
component.summary: GTK+ application for managing TOTP and HOTP tokens with built-in encryption.

description.p: Easy to use GTK application for securely managing TOTP and HOTP tokens. The content is encrypted on the disk using AES256-GCM and the master password is derived using PBKDF2 with 100k iterations and SHA512 as hash algorithm. It's also possible to import/export backups from/to andOTP and import backups from Authenticator+.
OTPClient 3.1.0 the following feature and fixes:

ul.li: New feature (#258): entries can be displayed as a QR-Code
Updated the artwork credits in the about dialog
All keyboard shortcuts have been revised, be sure to check them (Ctrl-k)
Removed an unused variable

description.p: OTPClient 3.0.0 brings some exciting news:

ul.li: New feature (#263): OTPClient is now translatable (open a GitHub issue if you want to help translating it in your language).
New feature (#259): it's now possible to edit also the secret.
Improved: an About dialog has been added in the settings menu.
Removed (#257): Authenticator Plus support has been removed.
Various small fixes.
